CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of numbers indicates when to auto-send reminder and overdue emails for forms not yet submitted. For example, "-10, -5, 0, 20, 7+" sends reminders 10 and 5 days before the due date as well as on the due date. It sends an overdue notice 20 days after the due date and every 7 days thereafter.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma-separated list of numbers indicates when to auto-send reminder and overdue emails for forms not yet submitted. For example, "-10, -5, 0, 20, 7+" sends reminders 10 and 5 days before the due date as well as on the due date. It sends an overdue notice 20 days after the due date and every 7 days thereafter.
CustomField.label: Reminder/overdue number of days
